column4: can someone tell me, if i order a computer with no OS then install linux will i have to get all the linux drivers for my hardware manually?
ok brilliant - the hardware is the usual stuff
I've used the live cd on many different machines and ALL the hardware just worked (including printers and what-have-you)
nvidia GF5200fx worked fine, now my GF9800GT works great too (with the closed source drivers mind you)
